DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate safety efficacy brimonidine tartrate/timolol fix combination ( Combigan® ) compare brimonidine tartrate ( Alphagan® ) timolol patient glaucoma ocular hypertension respond well topical beta blocker .
DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Brimonidine Tartrate/Timolol Fixed Combination Patients With Glaucoma Ocular Hypertension
DOC.mesh_term: Brimonidine Tartrate , Timolol Maleate Drug Combination
DOC.criteria: Openangle glaucoma ocular hypertension least one eye responsive topical beta blocker No anticipate wear contact lens study Active ocular disease glaucoma ocular hypertension ( eg , uveitis , ocular infection severe dry eye ) Any intraocular surgery laser ( eg , cataract surgery Lasik ) within 3 month Required regular use ocular medication except occasional use artificial tear
